Window.borderStyle

Function/Meaning
Window appearance
Type
Property of Window class (read/write)
Description
Represents the appearance of the window. You can also set the value.
The following values can be set:
bsDialog : Non-resizable window with an appearance similar to a dialog box.
bsSingle : Non-resizable window.
bsNone : Window with no border.
bsSizeable : Standard resizable window. This is the default.
bsToolWindow : Non-resizable tool window (window with a small caption).
bsSizeToolWin : Similar to bsToolWindow, but resizable.
